title: After Dark
author: Haruki Murakami
description: A a surreal, atmospheric novel that explores the interconnected lives of strangers during a single enigmatic night in Tokyo.

title: The Day The Sun Died
author: Yan Lianke
description: The Day The Sun Died by Yan Lianke is a darkly satirical novel about a small village descending into chaos as its residents, caught in a nightmarish state of “dreamwalking,” blur the lines between reality and dream, exposing the fragility of societal order.
